articles.title: Messi to leave Barca; City make Grealish EPL’s most expensive player, eye Kane - Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: It’s been a busy day in the European transfer market with the news two of the continent’s most in-demand stars will leave their boyhood clubs ahead of the new season.
articles.content: FC Barcelona wholeheartedly expresses its gratitude to the player for his contribution to the aggrandisement of the club and wishes him all the very best for the future in his personal and profession… [+3171 chars]

articles.author: Jonathan Chadwick
articles.title: Exoplanet 35 light years away has half the mass of Venus, study says - Daily Mail
articles.description: Astronomers used the European Southern Observatory's Very Large Telescope (VLT), located in the Atacama Desert of northern Chile to shed light on the neighbouring planetary system, L 98-59.
articles.content:
A tiny, rocky exoplanet that orbits a star 35 light years away from Earth is half the mass of Venus, a new study reveals.  
The planet, called L 98-59b, is the closest planet to its star, called L 9… [+7358 chars]

articles.title: UK musicians WILL be able to tour in key EU countries without visa - Daily Mail
articles.description: Musicians from the UK will be able to tour in key European countries without needing a visa or work permit after a breakthrough on post-Brexit border rules.
articles.content:
